name: Llamas, Pajamas, Mamas, and Papas? Quiz / Test  | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the same about llamas, pajamas, and dramas? Which word also belongs to this group?
questions.explanation:
mamas.

	All of these words RHYME: mamas, llamas, dramas, pajamas.

questions.text: Which fits with scarlet, magenta, and burgundy?
questions.explanation:
maroon.

	Scarlet, magenta, burgundy, and maroon are all SHADES OF RED OR PINK.

questions.text: Which fits with contented, joyful, and glad?
questions.explanation:
ecstatic.

	Contented, joyful, glad, and ecstatic all DESCRIBE HAPPY FEELINGS.

questions.text: Which fits with suitcase, backpack, and purse?
questions.explanation:
briefcase.

	PEOPLE CARRY STUFF IN suitcases, backpacks, purses, and briefcases.

questions.text: Which fits with paper, pen, and pencil?
questions.explanation:
eraser.

	Paper, pens, pencils, and erasers are all USED FOR WRITING.

questions.text: Which fits with artichoke, cauliflower, and radish?
questions.explanation:
asparagus.

	Artichokes, cauliflower, radishes, and asparagus are all VEGETABLES.

questions.text: Which fits with lioness, mare, and cow?
questions.explanation:
doe.

	Lioness, mare, cow, and doe are all WORDS FOR FEMALE ANIMALS. A doe is a female deer.

questions.text: Which fits with note, verse, and melody?
questions.explanation:
tune.

	Notes, verses, melodies, and tunes all HAVE TO DO WITH MUSIC.

questions.text: Which fits with cheetah, panther, and tiger?
questions.explanation:
lion.

	Cheetahs, panthers, tigers, and lions are all BIG CATS.

questions.text: Which fits with cup, mug, and tumbler?
questions.explanation:
glass.

	PEOPLE DRINK FROM cups, mugs, tumblers, and glasses.
